QuestData.Title: Infernal Encroachment
QuestData.Description: The demons are on the move, $r!$b$bIf nothing is done, we'll be overrun in a matter of weeks. I've just returned from Mannoroc Coven, where the infernals there are falling from the sky!$b$bWe need to at least buy ourselves some time. Get down there and pick up where I left off!
QuestData.LogDescription: Felgur Twocuts wants you to destroy 10 Lesser Infernals.
QuestData.CompletionText: How are things at Mannoroc Coven, $r?
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $r!$b$bThe danger persists, but you have bought us some time.
